session.createDate: <2024-01-01T10:00:00> //ISO8601 UTC date-time, use this format because data bases are agnostic of time zones

experimentId: <string>, //We get it from request coming from the discovery portal

authors.authorName: <string>, //It might be interesting, although it might be enough to go and have the Discovery Portal show you whatever corresponds to the author id, once a RAI id has been resolved.
authors.rorId: <The affiliation, institution or organization with which the author is associated>
authors.id: <string>, //Return a uuid now, in the future we should take it out of authentication & authorization.

dataSet.id: <string>, //The id for us is currently the hash_query_real, so we don't need it This can be another PID created from raise, or just a unique id, it is under discussion
dataSet.hash: <string>, //Right now fixed to ‘heart_rate’, in the future “hash_query_real
dataSet.sourceId: <uuid (string)>, //Right now empty, but according to the user requirements, it is interesting to fill this with the results of the filter / query for SD / AD, to know which  datasets (e.g. study A, study B)

authors.authorName: string, //It might be interesting, although it might be enough to go and have the Discovery Portal show you whatever corresponds to the author id, once a RAI id has been resolved.
authors.rorId: The affiliation, institution or organization with which the author is associated

processingScript.description: <string>, //At the moment no description is requested to the External Researcher of  the experiment, to be included in the future.
processingScript.encryptedCode: <string>, //<NEW according to T3.5 desc> =>Think about need for the discovery portal to give the  decryption code if the External Researcher (owner of the code)  gives the OK

metadata.processingScriptStorage: <true>, // enable storage of processingScript inside RCS

processingResult.results: <string>, //Contents of the results file in minio

metadata.processingResultStorage: <true>, // (Default value: true) is valued false to prevent results to be stored inside RCS otherwise result are by default stored inside RCS.
